message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic product at a price of $9,500. I believe this product will be very valuable to you, and this is a very competitive offer.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to see if we can meet in the middle.
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,500 is too low for me.  Could you do $9,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $8,500. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,750? I think this is a fair price for both of us.
